slide.title: Focus
slide.blurb: Widgets can grab the keyboard focus if needed, but it only makes sense for the ones that interact with keyboard in some way. So, *GtkEntry* will work, for example, while *GtkArrow* will not.
It is possible to specify which widget should be activated when the user presses the *Enter* key in a dialog box. Such a widget is called a ~default~ one.
